queryStringToStruct

private struct queryStringToStruct(string queryString, [string queryStringDelim='&'], [string keyValueDelim='='])
Converts a URL query string to a structure

Parameters:
queryString - Query string to parse
queryStringDelim - Delimiter separating URL parameters
keyValueDelim - Delimiter for the keys/values

setCustomTagPath

setDatasource

public void setDatasource(string name, [string description], string databasetype, [string database], [string server], [string username], [string password], [numeric port], [string additionalConnectionParameters], [numeric loginTimeout], [numeric connectionTimeout='60'], [boolean connectionPooling], [numeric maxConnections], [boolean allowSQL_select='TRUE'], [boolean allowSQL_insert='TRUE'], [boolean allowSQL_update='TRUE'], [boolean allowSQL_delete='TRUE'], [boolean allowSQL_storedprocedure], [boolean allowSQL_create='TRUE'], [boolean allowSQL_alter='TRUE'], [boolean allowSQL_drop='TRUE'], [boolean allowSQL_grant='TRUE'], [boolean allowSQL_revoke='TRUE'], [boolean allowSQL_blob='FALSE'], [boolean allowSQL_clob='FALSE'], [string jdbcURL], [string jdbcClass])
Creates Railo datasource

Parameters:
name - datasource name
description - description for datasource [ignored]
databasetype - database type
  • jdbc
  • mssql - defaults to jTDS JDBC driver
  • mysql
  • oracle
  • postgresql
database - name of database to use (or SID for Oracle)
server - database server
username - database username
password - database password
port - database port (will use databasetype default unless specified)
additionalConnectionParameters - additional parameters for database connection
loginTimeout - login timeout (in seconds) [ignored]
connectionTimeout - timeout for database connection (in seconds)
connectionPooling - is the connection pooled [ignored]
maxConnections - maximum number of connections allowed
allowSQL_select - are SQL select statements allowed
allowSQL_insert - are SQL insert statements allowed
allowSQL_update - are SQL update statements allowed
allowSQL_delete - are SQL delete statements allowed
allowSQL_storedprocedure - are SQL stored procedures allowed [ignored]
allowSQL_create - are SQL create statements allowed
allowSQL_alter - are SQL alter statements allowed
allowSQL_drop - are SQL drop statements allowed
allowSQL_grant - are SQL grant statements allowed
allowSQL_revoke - are SQL revoke statements allowed
allowSQL_blob - are SQL blobs allowed
allowSQL_clob - are SQL clobs allowed
jdbcURL - JDBC URL to use (databasetype='jdbc' only)
jdbcClass - Class for JDBC Driver (databasetype='jdbc' only)

structToQueryString

private string structToQueryString(struct keyValueStruct, [string queryStringDelim='&'], [string keyValueDelim='='])
Converts a structure to a URL query string

Parameters:
keyValueStruct - Structure of key/value pairs you want converted to URL parameters
queryStringDelim - Delimiter separating url parameters
keyValueDelim - Delimiter for the keys/values
